title: Project Initiation
description: Kickoff the project, gather requirements, and define the project scope and objectives.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, interfaces, data flows, and data models. Consider scalability, security, and performance requirements. Define the roles and responsibilities of each component, as well as the communication protocols and data formats.

title: Data Analytics Platform Design
description: Design the centralized data analytics platform for processing and analyzing data from various urban systems, including data ingestion, storage, processing, and visualization components. Consider scalability, fault tolerance, and real-time processing requirements.

title: IoT Device Integration
description: Define the requirements and protocols for integrating IoT devices from different urban systems.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design a responsive and intuitive user interface for monitoring and controlling the integrated urban systems. The UI should provide a centralized dashboard with real-time data visualization, alerts, and control mechanisms. Consider accessibility, usability, and security best practices.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Define security requirements, data privacy policies, and compliance standards for the system.

title: Infrastructure and Deployment Planning
description: Plan the infrastructure requirements, deployment strategies, and monitoring tools for the system.
